00022 /**

00025  * @date   Mon Oct 24 09:30:28 2005

00027  * @brief  Class for supplying the mismatch intensity as pm adjustment.
00028  */
00029 #ifndef _MMADJUST_H_
00030 #define _MMADJUST_H_
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/ChipLayout.h"
00034 #include "chipstream/PmAdjuster.h"
00035 
00036 /// String describing mm adjust algorithm/module
00037 #define MMADJUSTSTR "pm-mm"
00038 
00039 /**
00040  *  Class for supplying the mismatch intensity as pm adjustment.
00041  */
00042 class MmAdjust : public PmAdjuster {
00043 
00044 public:
00045 
00046   MmAdjust(){
00047     setupSelfDoc(*this);
00048     m_Type = getDocName();
00049   }
00050 
00051   /** 
00052    * @brief Constructor that takes the list of probe sets to remember
00053    * the pm/mm pairs.
00054    * 
00055    * @param layout - Annotation of probes on microarray.
00056    */
00057   void setLayout(ChipLayout &layout);
00058 
00059   /** 
00060    * @brief Setup ourselves based on data in the blackboard, specifically the
00061    * the pm/mm pairs.
00062    * 
00063    * @param board - blackboard with various state
00064    */
00065   void setParameters(PsBoard &board);
00066 
00067   /** 
00068    * Subset of probes that should be loaded into memory representation.
00069    * @param probes - bitmask of probes to be used.
00070    */
00071   void setProbes(std::vector<bool> &probes);
00072 
00073   /** 
00074    * @brief Given a PM probe intensity, supply the MM probe intensity.
00075    * @param probeIx - Index of probe in cel file data.
00076    * @param chipIx - Microarray or chip index.
00077    * @param iMart - IntensityMart which holds raw data.
00078    * @param iTrans - Vector of transformations that should be performed on raw data.
00079    * @param pmIintensity - Intensity of perfect match probe to be adjusted, may
00080    * be modified from original value depending on adjuster
00081    * @param bgrdAdjust - Background adjustment, if any, recommended (i.e. MM intensity)
00082    */
00083   void pmAdjustment(int probeIx, int chipIx, 
00084                     const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00085                     float &pmIntensity, float &bgrdAdjust);
00086 
00087   /** 
00088    * Fill in the information for Self documentation.
00089    * @param doc - Self documenter to be filled in.
00090    */
00091   static void setupSelfDoc(SelfDoc &doc) {
00092     doc.setDocName(MMADJUSTSTR);
00093     doc.setDocDescription("Use mismatch probe as adjustment for perfect match. Has strength of being unbiased, but often the mismatch probe binds the match target.");
00094     // No parameters...
00095   }
00096 
00097   /** 
00098    * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00099    * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00100    * @return SelfDoc
00101    */
00102   static SelfDoc explainSelf() { 
00103     SelfDoc doc;
00104     setupSelfDoc(doc);
00105     return doc;
00106   }
00107 
00108   /** 
00109    * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00110    * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00111    * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00112    * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00113    * 
00114    * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00115    * 
00116    * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00117    */
00118   static SelfCreate *newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string> &param) {
00119     if(param.size() != 0) { Err::errAbort(ToStr("No parameters for ") + ToStr(MMADJUSTSTR)); }
00120     return new MmAdjust();
00121   }
00122 
00123 private:
00124   /// Map of PM index on chip to MM index on chip.
00125   //  std::map<int, int> m_Map;
00126   std::vector<int> m_Vec;
00127 
00128 };
